lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Lakers spent the last few summers attempting to sell the NBA's top free agents on the franchise's glamorous combination of history and Hollywood.

headline.print_headline: Lakers Selling Their Future, Not History, to Free Agents
headline.main: Lakers Selling Their Future, Not History, to Free Agents
